name: Pogo Panic
description:
You are Toad a kangoroo who dreams of being a bunny.

Get to the rabbit hole using 'A' and 'D', or the arrow keys. On HTML5 first click on the window to gain control.

This game uses the Godot Engine and was made in 2h55m.

The HTML5 has an unpleasant jitter, try a downloadable to avoid this.
